content: It has been my target to create a personal website as a personal wiki or to record my views. It is finally here! Took a weekend to complete the (weird) setup for hugo/github pages but I am delighted to complete this.
summary: It has been my target to create a personal website as a personal wiki or to record my views. It is finally here! Took a weekend to complete the (weird) setup for hugo/github pages but I am delighted to complete this.
title: Finally Online!
